description: Ministry of Labour and Labour Relations - Collective Agreements - No. 07 of 2014 entered into between Ceylon Biscuts Limited and the Inter Company Employees' Union; No. 08 of 2014 enterd into between Ceytra (Private) Limited and the Inter Company Employees' Union; and No. 07 of 2013 entred into between Ceylon Tobacco Company, Plc and the Food Beverages & Tobacco Industries Employees' Union
